product.name: L'Oreal Paris Extra-Intense Liquid Pencil Eyeliner
product.description: Now get the intense look and luxurious feel of a liquid liner with the easy application and precision of a pencil.  Extra-Intense Liquid Pencil Eyeliner glides on smoothly and evenly for beautiful definition in a single stroke.  The smudge-resistant formula provides 16 hours of non-stop wear.
